data_table.description: This sample attributes table includes type of data or capture method used, capture reagent information (n=4 variables; short name, name, description, and manufacturer), data generation platform, alignment program used to place reads along the reference sequence, and file format.

variable.name: DATA_TYPE
variable.description: The type of data or capture method used

variable.name: CAPTURE_REAGENT_SHORT_NAME
variable.description: Shortened descriptor for the capture reagent

variable.name: CAPTURE_REAGENT_NAME
variable.description: The name of type of capture reagent used

variable.name: READ_ALIGNER
variable.description: Alignment program used to place reads along the reference sequence

variable.name: FILE_FORMAT
variable.description: File type submitted for the sample
